#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <sstream>

#include <time.h>

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

bool isprime(long long i){
	int s = sqrt(i);
	for(int j=3;j<=s;j=j+2){
		if(i%j == 0)
			return false;
	}
	return true;
}


void incrstring(string s,string & current){

//	cout << "Current:" << current << " " <<current[s.find_last_of("?")] << endl;
	
	if(current[s.find_last_of("?")] < '9')
		current[s.find_last_of("?")]++;
	else{
		current[s.find_last_of("?")]='0';
		s[s.find_last_of("?")] = '0';
		incrstring(s,current);
	}	
	
//	cout << "Current Incremented :" << current << endl;

}

string replace(string s){
	
	if(s[0] == '?')
		s[0] = '1';
	
	while(s.find_last_of("?")!=string::npos){
	s[s.find_last_of("?")]='0';
	}
	return s;
}

string convertInt(int number)
{
	stringstream ss;//create a stringstream
	ss << number;//add number to the stream
	return ss.str();//return a string with the contents of the stream
}

long long stringtolonglong(string s){

	long long x=0;
	
	for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
		x*=10;
		x+=s[i]-'0';
	}
	return x;
}
int main(){
	//	double start = (double)clock() / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
	int cases;
	scanf("%d",&cases);
	
/*	int count=0;
	int arr[78500];
	for(int i=3;i<=1000000;i+=2)
		if(isprime(i))
			arr[count++]=i;
*/	

	for(int i=0;i<cases;i++){
		
		string s;
		cin >> s;

	//	cout << "Entered:" << s << endl;
		
		if(s.length() == 1){
			printf("5\n");
			continue;
		}
		
		string p = replace(s);
	//	cout << "Replaced:" << p << endl;



		while(true){
			
			incrstring(s,p);
	//		cout << "incr:" << p << endl;
			long long w;
			w = stringtolonglong(p);
			
			if(w%2 ==0 || w%5 ==0)
				continue;
			
			if(isprime(w)){
				printf("%lld\n",w);
				break;
			}
				
		}
		
	}
	//	double end = (double)clock() / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
	//	double elapsed = end - start;
	//	cout << elapsed << endl;
 
 
	return 0;
}
